ygData.msgSnippet: Within the confines of the Brig, within the Predacon fort, the three Maximal prisoners wallowed in despair. Aquarious, Nighteyes, and Paddletail had thought

    Within the confines of the Brig, within the Predacon fort, the three 
Maximal prisoners wallowed in despair. Aquarious, Nighteyes, and Paddletail 
had thought and thought and thought of a way to escape but it seemed 
impossible. They had to make contact with some Maximals. They had to get out 
and talk to there brothers and sister. If they didnt get out soon, they knew 
these crule Predacons would reprogram them, or worse.
    "I cant take this anymore! PREDACONS! COME AND GET ME!" Aquarious, the 
dolphin, screamed. He needed water to survive, and he had been without for 
several days. Soon, he would die.
    "Aquarious! Shh! If they come who knows what they might do to us!" 
Paddletail said, nervously.
    Nighteyes remain quiet. SH ewanted someone to come. Anything was better 
than this. She was loseing her mind.
